info.title: Graph API for Insights
info.description: An ASP.NET Core Graph API for Insights

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Filter by path

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.name: finishTime
parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.name: eventTypes
parameters.description: Filter by Event Type

get.summary: Gets the summary of specific groups.
Gets the .zip file from exporting the permission related information of specific groups.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Sets the email addresses or group Id or group logonname of group for which you want to export the permission report

parameters.name: exportOptionType
parameters.description:
So far support:
1 - for exporting both the summary report and site collection level access report
2 - for exporting both the summary report and access report to all objects in the configured data scope
3 - for only exporting the summary report

parameters.name: siteUrls
parameters.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to export the permission report.

parameters.name: dataSources
parameters.description:
Sets the workspace in which you want to export the access report of users. Multiple values are allowed.
microsoft teams 
sharepoint online
onedrive for business
microsoft 365 group

get.summary: The API is for check health of API service

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job Id

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job Id

get.summary: Gets the summary of specific links.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Sets the URL of site collections for which you want to get the summary information.

parameters.name: linkType
parameters.description:
Sets the link types that you are about to get.
External Link = 32
Organization Link = 64
Anonymous Link = 128

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Sets the number of links displayed in each page of the result. The number must be no larger than 100.

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Sets whether to get the remaining results of a request of which the results are more than 100.

get.summary: Gets the .zip file from exporting the permission related information of specific links.

parameters.name: exportLinkType
parameters.description:
Set export type
32 (for FlexibleLink link)
64 (for organization link)
128 (for external link)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.name: finishTime
parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

get.summary: Gets the permission-related information of specific site collections.
get.description: The api/v1/site/permission/export API is recommended when the site collections that you are about to export are over 2,000.

parameters.name: siteUrls
parameters.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to get the permission related information

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Sets whether to get the remaining results of a request of which the results are more than 100.

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Sets the number of results for one page. 100 results on one page at most.

get.summary: Exports the permission reports of specific site collections.
get.description: You can only export permission reports of 100 site collections at a time.

parameters.name: siteUrls
parameters.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to export the permission report.

parameters.name: riskLevel
parameters.description: Enter the set of risk levels.

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Sets the number of results for one page. 100 results on one page at most.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: sharepoint site uri

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: sharepoint site Id

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Sets the number of results for one page. 100 results on one page at most.

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: sharepoint site Id

parameters.name: objectUrl
parameters.description: sharepoint object url

parameters.name: tagName
parameters.description: tag name

get.summary: Gets the summary of specific users.

parameters.name: startPage
parameters.description: The starting page of the query starts from 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Sets the number of results for one page. 100 results on one page at most.

get.summary: Gets the permission-related information of specific users.
get.description: The api/v1/user/permission/export API is recommended when the users that you are about to export are over 2,000.

parameters.name: siteUrls
parameters.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to get the permission related information

parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: Sets the email addresses of users for which you want to export the permission report

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Sets whether to get the remaining results of a request of which the results are more than 100.

get.summary: Exports the access reports of specific users in different workspaces.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Sets the email addresses of users for which you want to export the permission report

parameters.name: siteUrls
parameters.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to export the permission report.

parameters.name: dataSources
parameters.description:
Sets the workspace in which you want to export the access report of users. Multiple values are allowed.
microsoft teams 
sharepoint online
onedrive for business
microsoft 365 group

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by email

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

parameters.description: Filter By Time, Time format:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

inheritType.description: The status whether the permission is inherited.

sensitivityLevel.description: The sensitivity level of the object.

sensitiveInfoType.description: The sensitive info type of the object.

isDirect.description: The status whether the permission is directly granted.

sensitivityLabel.description: The sensitivity label of the object.

inheritedFrom.description: The parent from which the permission inherits.

nextLink.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

language.description:
Sets the language of the report you are about to export.
<value>Default: en-US Support: en-US/ja-JP/fr-FR</value>

siteUrls.description: Sets the URLs of site collections for which you want to get the permission related information. 100 URLs at most.

emails.description: Sets the email addresses of users for which you want to export the permission report. 100 email addresses at most.

token.description: Sets whether to get the remaining results of a request of which the results are more than 100.

top.description: Sets the number of results for one page. 100 results on one page at most.

<value>100 URLs at most.</value>

email.description: The email address of the group

groupType.description:
The type of the group.
<value>
Microsoft 365 Group
Security Group
Distribution Group
Mail-enabled Security Group
</value>

membershipType.description:
The membership type of the group:
<value>
Assigned
Dynamic
</value>

createdOn.description: The time when the group is created.

externalMemberCount.description: The number of external users in the group.

nextLink.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

content.description: The remark. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

nextToken.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

status.description:
Export Status
<value>
None = 0,
Inprogress = 1,
Successful = 2,
Failed = 3,
SuccessWithException = 4,
Stopping = 5,
Stopped = 6
</value>

id.description: The ID in the link summary.

siteId.description: The site ID in which the object is shared by the link.

selfId.description: The selfID of the object which is shared by the link.

createTime.description: The time when the link is created.

expireTime.description:
The time when the link is expired.
This is only available for anonymous links.

name.description: The object name that is shared via the link.

objectUrl.description: The object URL that is shared via the link.

linkType.description:
The link type.
<value>
32(for flexible link)
64 (for organization link)
128 (for anonymous link)
</value>

shareBy.description: The user who created the link.

inheritFrom.description: The parent from which the permission inherits.

inheritType.description: The status whether the permission is inherited.

shareWith.description: The number of users and groups with whom the link is shared.

permission.description: The permission with which the link is shared.

fileType.description: The type of the object shared via the link.

sensitivityLevel.description: The sensitivity level of the object shared via the link.

nextLink.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

language.description:
Sets the language of the report you are about to export.
<value>Default: en-US Support: en-US/ja-JP/fr-FR</value>

token.description: Sets whether to get the remaining results of a request of which the results are more than 100.

pageSize.description: Sets the number of links displayed in each page of the result. The number must be no larger than 100.

linkType.description:

 <value>

</value>

numberOfMembers.description: The number of members in the group.

isExternalUser.description: The status whether external users exist.

linkGivingAccessTo.description: The members that are given the permission via link.

language.description:
Sets the language of the report you are about to export.
<value>Default: en-US Support: en-US/ja-JP/fr-FR</value>

startPage.description: Sets the start page from which you want to get the group summary. The default value is 1.

pageSize.description: Sets the number of groups displayed in each page of the result. The number must be no larger than 100. The default value is 100.

SummaryViewModuleOptions.description: Get summary by using the paging option

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

loginName.description: The login name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

userStatus.description:
The user’s sign-in status in Microsoft 365.
<value>
Blocked (for a user in Azure AD whose sign-in to Microsoft 365 is blocked)
Activate (for a user in Azure AD whose sign in to Microsoft 365 is active)
Not in Azure AD (for a user who is not in Azure AD)
</value>

trustStatus.description:
The user’s trust status in Insights for Microsoft 365.
<value>
Trusted (for a trusted user in Insights for Microsoft 365)
Not Trusted (for a user who is not trusted in Insights for Microsoft 365)
</value>

sitesWithDirectAcccess.description: The number of sensitive items to which the user has been granted direct permissions.

lastSignIn.description: The user’s last sign-in time to Microsoft 365.

createdOn.description: The time when the user is created in Azure AD.

nextLink.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

content.description: The remark. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.

nextToken.description: The token to be used to get the remaining results of this request. The element is not used for this API and responded with “null” by default.
